name: context-engineering
title: Context Engineering
description: Comprehensive context engineering toolkit with specialized commands for analyzing and documenting codebase architecture, tech stack, coding guidelines, and generating project glossaries.
author: Pandora Team

commands.name: context-eng:all
commands.description: Generate comprehensive context engineering documentation by running all context-eng commands

commands.name: context-eng:architecture
commands.description: Analyze and document the system architecture and design patterns of your codebase

commands.name: context-eng:coding-guidelines
commands.description: Extract and document coding standards, patterns, and best practices from your codebase

commands.name: context-eng:glossary
commands.description: Generate a comprehensive glossary of domain-specific terms and terminology used in your project

commands.name: context-eng:tech-stack
commands.description: Document and analyze the technology stack, dependencies, and framework usage in your codebase
